data.title: Mid Doors to Mid Top Cascade
data.description: A good Cascade to push and take control of Mid, blocking off Mid Top.

data.title: B Site Post Plant Cascade + Cove
data.description: A good combo of utility to retake the B Site.

data.title: A Site Post Plant Cove
data.description: A good Cove to throw in a post plant scenario when the enemy has retreated to A Main.

data.title: Early Round A Main Aggression Cascade
data.description: Here's a great way to help your teammates take space in A Main early, and make it more difficult for enemy players to push into A Main.

data.title: B Main Retake High Tide from B Link
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to use your High Tide in one of two ways to help your team retake B Site from B link.
